summary:
- **Divestment of HTAL Stake**: Spark New Zealand selling its 10% stake in Hutchison Telecommunications (Australia) Limited (HTAL) to Hutchison Telecommunications (Amsterdam) BV.  
- **Sale Price**: A$0.032 per share (45% premium to Independent Expert’s upper valuation range, 39% premium to 3-month VWAP).  
- **Proceeds**: NZ$47 million expected in July 2025, to be used for **Net Debt Reduction**.  
- **Rationale**: Part of strategic review of **non-core assets**.  

(No timetable or capital-raising details; purely an asset sale announcement.)
